replies.body: So I guess no Zed sale this month even though it showed him in the June Sales....
Friday is still June, he will come on sale then.
Ah true, I think Talon still needs to go up also.  Unless I just flat out missed him this month lol.
I think talon is also gonna go up this Friday so you'll be good lol

Friday's sales will be (assuming I didn't fudge one somewhere):
Divine Soraka
Pentakill Olaf
Traditional Lee Sin
Warden Sivir

Evelynn
Pantheon
Talon
Zed

Tuesday is when the July sales actually start.
Yeah, wut? Was gonna pick him up this week.
Woad Scout Quinn was on sale for two months in a row but was only on sale once.
